dataset_info.name: Road Degradation Detection Dataset
dataset_info.description: Dataset for detecting road and infrastructure anomalies including potholes, cracks, crazing, and faded road markings

classes.name: pothole
classes.description: Holes or depressions in road surface

classes.name: longitudinal_crack
classes.description: Cracks running parallel to road direction

classes.name: crazing
classes.description: Network of fine cracks in pavement surface

classes.name: faded_road_marking
classes.description: Worn or faded lane markings and road paint
